resources.string: Press and hold an item to get contextual info
Press and hold a name of a country or region to view info.
Press and hold a name of an animal or plant to view info.
Press and hold a book title to view description and rating.
"Press and hold a celebrity's name to view info."
Press and hold a web fiction book title to view info.
Press and hold a movie/TV show title to view description and rating.
Press and hold a flight/train number to view info.
"Press and hold a name of a hotel or guest house to view it's rating and other info."
Links to products will be opened in e-commerce apps
Web page URLs will be opened in your default browser
Press and hold a link to view info.
Press and hold a name of a location to view info.
"Press and hold a name of a scenic spot to view it's rating and other info."
Press and hold a name of a shop/restaurant to view its average check and rating.
View results in full screen mode
View results in split screen mode
Most countries and regions of the world are supported.

"Some frequently used names of countries and regions aren't provided with the info, as they appear in texts very frequently and don't necessarily put emphasis on geography. When geographic names are included in the names of territorial structures and institutions (e.g., Haidian District People's Government), the info won't be provided as well in order to avoid disturbing repititions."
"If you think that various terms outside of the category described above aren't provided with the info you need, you can report such issues using Feedback."
The info about 27K species of animals and 42K species of plants can be provided now.

"Some frequently used names of animals and plants (e.g., cat, dog, apple, rose) aren't provided with the info, as they appear in texts very frequently and don't necessarily put emphasis on zoology and botany."
"If you think that various terms outside of the category described above aren't provided with the info you need, you can report such issues using Feedback."
If multiple books have the same title, a more recent and popular result will be displayed. Disambiguation options are also available.
Use %s to report errors and help us make Taplus better.

"Celebrity database contains info about 3 million people. Other Baike.com articles aren't available. When multiple people have the same name, the info about a more popular person will be displayed. You can also open Baike and use the disambiguation feature."
Only names in simplified Chinese are supported currently.
Use %s to report errors and help us make Taplus better.
If various books have similar titles or versions, more recent and popular are prioritized. Options for disambiguation are also available.
"If Taplus doesn't recognize some book titles, you can report such issues using Feedback."
If multiple movies or TV shows have the same title, a more recent and popular result will be displayed. Disambiguation options are also available.
Use %s to report errors and help us make Taplus better.
All flight and train numbers are supported.
Use %s to report errors and help us make Taplus better.
"If various hotels have similar names, the ones closer to you will be shown. Options for disambiguation are also available. Hotels from other cities won't be shown to you."
"If Taplus doesn't recognize some hotels or guesthouses, you can report such issues using Feedback."
Links to products, shops, and events from Taobao, Tmall, and other e-commerce platforms are recognized separately.
Use %s to report errors and help us make Taplus better.
Full addresses (e.g.: Beijing, Haidian District, 7 East Anningzhuang Rd.) are searchable countrywide.
Short addresses (e.g.: Zhongshan Park, Nanjing Road) will be specific to your current location.
Use %s to report errors and help us make Taplus better.
If various scenic spots have similar names, the ones closer to you will be shown. Options for disambiguation are also available.
"If Taplus doesn't recognize some scenic spots, you can report such issues using Feedback."
If multiple shops or restaurants have the same name, a result which is closer to your location will be displayed. Disambiguation options are also available.
"Businesses located in other cities won't be displayed."
Use %s to report errors and help us make Taplus better.
"Taplus currently doesn't support items with unconventional spelling, as well as the browsers which don't run on default kernel. These issues will be gradually solved in the following versions."
Use %s to report errors and help us make Taplus better.
若同意开始使用传送门，即表示你同意上述内容、《用户协议》及《隐私政策》，你是否同意？
"Welcome to Taplus! This app allows you to analyze content and get contextual info. Taplus won't use your text and images in purposes other than to provide this service."
不授权定位权限开始使用
"若你不同意授权定位权限，传送门将不会为你识别相关分类内容，但不影响百科、电影等其他分类识别的正常使用。 你可以随时在传送门设置中关闭传送门功能，并同时收回所有授权。"
在功能使用过程中，我们将严格遵守相关法律法规和隐私政策以保护你的个人信息。传送门需要联网并调用以下权限或功能：
用于商户店铺、地理位置、酒店旅馆、旅游景区四类内容的识别
要允许 传送门 通过网络或卫星对您的设备定位吗？
Taplus User Agreement and Privacy Policy
Sharing to Weibo requires the Weibo account which is associated with your Mi Account. Activate your Mi Account to continue.
Sharing to Weibo requires the Weibo account which is associated with your Mi Account. Sign in to your Mi Account to continue.
Allow this app to connect to the internet and grant the mandatory permissions listed above.
For providing relevant weather info and location-based services
For using files and content from this device for search queries
For identifying your device isng IMEI
Press and hold to drag multiple items

"Note: To avoid triggering unnecessary actions, MIUI restricted Taplus in the following cases:
1. When an app works in the fullscreen mode (e.g., games and videos). 2. When a keyboard may appear so you could enter text. 3. When the object you press and hold is the text that's being edited. 4. When pressing and holding activates other native features and actions.
The restrictions above will be combined with the items you add to your blocklist."
"Add apps to blocklist if you think they don't need support from Taplus. Blocklist may help you avoid compatibility issues."
Install the latest version of Scanner to be able to use this feature
A server error occurred. Try again.
Press and hold to recognize images (Beta)
"Turn this feature on to recognize objects in images after you press and hold them. This feature is being developed and isn't fully functional yet."
Press and hold to recognize objects in images
Unrecognized results and elements which may block important UI parts will still be folded even if you choose to display unfolded results.
Press and hold an item with two fingers to use Taplus
Taplus is a system service that allows you to analyze images and text by pressing and holding items on your screen in order to get contextual info.
Press and hold an item with one finger to use Taplus
Just press and hold an item to learn more.
Allow this feature to connect to the internet and grant mandatory permissions to continue. Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using this feature.
Allow this feature to connect to the internet to continue. Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using this feature.

"Welcome to \"Select to search\" provided by Taplus! You can use this feature to perform quick searches while reading the news. To turn this feature on and off, open Mi Browser's settings and go to Additional settings > Select to search. To be able to work normally, this feature needs to connect to the internet and requires the following permissions:"
Mandatory permissions (used for basic features and services)

"Welcome to \"Select to search\" provided by Taplus! You can use this feature to perform quick searches while reading the news. To turn this feature on and off, open Mi Browser's settings and go to Additional settings > Select to search. To be able to work normally, this feature needs to connect to the internet."
Access phone number and device status
